document.full_text: despite fukushima and the gulf of mexico oil spill, energy policy makers are faced with the fact that if their countries want to secure domestic supplies and curb carbon emissions, their options are limited.
document.title: green column: pragmatism influencing energy debates
lines_and_colors: despite fukushima and the gulf of mexico oil spill, energy policy makers are faced with the fact that if their countries want to secure domestic supplies and curb carbon emissions, their options are limited.
